1.content: It had been over a year since you were first shrunk down to a quarter inch by your goth friend May. In this time you've been placed in her socks, placed in her boots, and she really loved to torture you by going without socks on the hotter days. She had used you as several different piercings, both in her face and other places on her body. She had you clean her bowls and bongs by mining out the resin, piece by piece. She smoked and drank with you in her mouth, and swallowed you if she felt like it. She took every opportunity she had to make sure you knew she had complete control of your life. The worst part was when she learned a spell that could shrink and grow you at her command, but she told you she would never grow you back to your normal size. You lived every day serving this goddess who kept you fed, kept you safe, and kept you imprisoned. One night after she kept you in her sock while she slept, you felt her starting to stir and wake up. You dreaded the days ahead of you, because she requested a whole week off, just to play with you. She finally sat up, stretched, and yawned before taking off her sock and dumping you into her hand. "What should we do today, little dude?" You just sit there and say nothing, because you know your opinion doesn't matter to her. "Aww, someone's in a bad mood. I know a way to cheer you up!" You start to regret saying nothing, and try to speak up before she...
1.title: Waking up

11.content: May popped you in her mouth like a piece of candy, rolling you from cheek to cheek with her tongue. You try to grab hold of her tongue stud, but it's too slick to hold a grip. What was supposed to be a breath of air turned into a chokingly thick cloud of smoke, dulling your senses with every inhale. By the time the smoke dissipated when she exhaled, you were barely able to breathe, let alone fight back before another wave of smoke rolled over you. You aren't even able to choke out a response before she giggles and says "Of course you do!" before popping you back in again for a few more hits. You start to become unstuck to the mucus at the back of her throat, and fall straight into the airflow leaving her mouth. Still covered in mucus and saliva, you fly through the air into a pile of dirty laundry. You consider yourself as lucky as you could be in your situation, considering 1 foot more to the left and you would've smashed into the hardwood floor. After doing a mental check to make sure you're ok, you begin to wonder if she knows where you went.
11.title: Puts you in her mouth

She found it annoying when you wouldn't come out of hiding to get in her running shoes, and threatened that she would stick you on her deodorant and rub you all over her sweaty pits when she finds you when she got back from her jog. 122212.content: May brings her hand to her armpit and feels the knot ensnaring you to this goddesses underarm. "Ugh, it kinda stinks, I get real hot and sweaty in there. You think it's bad in my socks? After today, you'll be grateful that I keep you in there! Now enough chit chat, I've gotta get dressed!" After you untangle the last knot of hair holding you in place, a thought occurs: even if you do manage to escape from her, you doubted you could survive the world for very long at your size. You hang there for a few minutes, thinking about what you would do. After a while, your arms start to tire out and you make your choice.
122212.title: Have fun there little dude!
